LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_TSZ.title: <color=#87b4ff>Far-Star Seeker</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_TSZ.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_pronoun]'s friends have determined to travel the world! But the Milky Way was already covered in the paw prints of Ferians. The network of stargates covered every corner of every galaxy. All sights of the world are just old faces. \n\nAfter the foxes stumbled upon a wormhole that led to an unknown galaxy. [PAWN_nameDef] determined to go out into the world.
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_TSZ_FTL.title: <color=#87beff>Far-Star Seeker</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_TSZ_FTL.baseDescrip: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_pronoun]'s friends have determined to travel the world! But the Milky Way was already covered in the paw prints of Ferians. The network of stargates covered every corner of every galaxy. All sights of the world are just old faces. \n\nAfter the foxes stumbled upon a wormhole that led to an unknown galaxy. [PAWN_nameDef] determined to go out into the world. But unlike the other vixens heading for the new world, [PAWN_pronoun]'s starship was equipped with a secret ftl drive.
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_KT.title: <color=#87b4ff>Alien-World Child</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_KT.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a new world. The climate here has not been changed, is still so primitive, but also so charming. Despite the dangers of the new world, [PAWN_pronoun] grew up hungry to explore the unknown. \n\nThe perfect material life, the incredible morals that make this world incredible.[PAWN_nameDef] have been receiving the pure culture, until master all the knowledge in the "book".
